name: Kyle Moses
elevator_speach: I spent my childhood taking things apart just to put them back together again. Building has always been a part of my inquisitive nature, and now I enjoy it for a living as a web developer. My natural love for trouble-shooting and trained eye for design allow me to offer a versatile skill set. This combination aligned with my passion for what I do puts me a cut above the rest.

work-history.title: Web UI Developer
work-history.description: Primary objectives include building new features and functionality for a large scale e-commerce website, Express.com. Focus on long-term projects, architectural decision making, develop reusable object-oriented JavaScript components, consume REST APIs, and craft functional cross-browser, responsive and adaptive UIs. I work on many large scale projects, both internal and customer facing. Including the development of a product mix & match tool, and rebuilding the Express.com product details page with a new technology stack including React.js, Express.js, Node.js. Part of a large agile(scrum) team working through all aspects of the development life-cycle. Daily interaction with the Atlassian ecosystem: Stash, Jira, Bamboo, Confluence. Publish content on varying CMSs like Oracle Commerce(ATG), Adobe Experience Manager, & Wordpress. Utilize front-end frameworks and libraries like jQuery.js, Angular.js, React.js, SASS, Foundation. Collaborate with back-end Java Engineers to deliver solutions. Update & Maintain existing site .JSP(Java Server Pages). Mentor and oversee junior developers and junior projects.

work-history.title: Interactive Designer & Developer
work-history.description: Responsible for both design & development of a suite e-commerce websites including TextbookRush.com, Bookstores.com & Fatbrain.co.uk. Collaborate with other .NET C# developers to build user friendly & cross browser compliant websites. Major projects included creating, designing, developing a game-style customer loyalty program. Developing a hybrid mobile app for TextbookRush.com using Angular.js & PhoneGap(cordova) to publish cross-platform. I Also worked closely with the Marketing Director on the creative direction of HTML emails, flash banner ads, print collateral, package design, general brainstorming, promotional materials, and brand identity development.

work-history.title: Digital Developer
work-history.description: Responsible for the front-end development of large scale pharmacuetical cross browser compliant, mobile & responsive websites, mobile web applications, iPad sales detailing aids, HTML Emails, Flash banner ads,. Some of the clients I have worked with include Eli Lilly, i3, Ignite, Palio, Inventiv Health, Harvest Tech, and Amylin Pharmaceuticals.

education.degree: Associates Degree of Applied Business in Advertising
